Bandhumā：1．Bandhumā． King of Bandhumatī and father of Vipassī Buddha．

His wife was Bandhumatī （J．1．41，etc．）．He had two daughters who，in their later lives，were Mahāmāyā andUracchadā （J．vi．480f）．

See also Ekasātaka andMettā Therī．

2．Bandhumā．A Pacceka Buddha．M．iii．70; ApA．i．107．
